Government
==========

Mayor & Town Council
--------------------

Find information on Little Elm's ruling body.

**[Mayor and Town Council](https://www.littleelm.gov/525/Mayors-Welcome-and-Town-Council-Bios "Mayor and Town Council")**

Boards & Commissions
--------------------

Learn more about the boards, committees, and commissions that assist the Town Council.

[**Boards and Commissions**](https://www.littleelm.gov/64/Boards-Commissions-Corporations "Boards and Commissions")

Municipal Court
---------------

The Municipal Court is the local court with jurisdiction over traffic and misdemeanor offenses.

**[Municipal Court](https://www.littleelm.gov/312/Municipal-Court "Municipal Court")**

Code of Ordinances
------------------

Get online access to the Code of Ordinances for the Town of Little Elm.

[**Code of Ordinances**](https://www.littleelm.gov/65/Code-of-Ordinances "Code of Ordinances")

Public Notices
--------------

Read the town's public notices.

[**Public Notices**](https://www.littleelm.org/1258/Agendas-Minutes-Videos "Public Notices")
